forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. South southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 69. Southwest wind 5 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the dawn has brought a gentle partly cloudy sky, promising a day that may unfold with the warmth of the sun lingering just above the horizon. The coolness of the early morning, with temperatures resting around 54 degrees, suggests a touch of the lingering marine layer, but it should yield to the day's brighter nature. As the sun rises higher, expect the brilliant embrace of blue skies to emerge, warming the day to a comfortable near 69 degrees. The soft breeze whispering from the south-southwest adds a refreshing note, enhancing the day’s appeal.

With the clarity of the urban vista improving, San Francisco invites its residents to step outside, perhaps to enjoy a stroll along the waterfront or to sit at a favorite café with a view of the bustling streets. Dressing in layers would be wise; a light sweater or jacket can help fend off the morning chill while staying prepared for the warmth as the sun ascends. Whether taking a leisurely walk through the parks or exploring local shops, the day promises a delightful blend of mild temperatures and invigorating breezes, perfect for savoring the charm of the city.
